ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 49
ygData.msgSnippet: this is true, prices are going up because the high level players will not waste their time with it when you can make 20 plat or so in no time killing. i no
ygData.messageBody:
this is true, prices are going up because the high level players will not waste their time with it when you can make 20 plat or so in no time killing.

i no longer even try to battle with my prices and tell them that my time is the most important thing, one counter offer and thats it


At 12:54 PM 7/8/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "David Bradshaw" <Logain@...>
>
>The help files on EQVault also said three sheets for a cloak. That is NOT
>correct. Cloaks take two sheets. My skill is 126 and I have been making
>cloaks since I as about 120 with reasonable success. Lately I have been
>noticing that mantles are failing alot. Not many problems with anything else
>though.
>
>However with the current economy on Karana I have not made any as I can make
>more pp by going to unrest. I get exp that way too...
>
>Thump Ghoulsbane
>Dwarven Cleric on Karana
>Master Smith
>
>>>
>>>Message: 1
>>> Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 09:26:11 -0500
>>> From: Peter Cox <pcox@...>
>>>Subject: Levels for banded
>>>
>>>Hi all,
>>>I just hit 102 in smithing last night, and I still have a pretty high
>>>failure rate for some pieces of banded (especially cloaks - I'm 0 for 20
>>>with those for some reason). Does anyone know the levels at which the
>>>various banded pieces become trivial (and thus their difficulty)?
>>>
>>>I know that bracers are trivial for me, and gorgets probably are too, but
>>>what about the rest?
>>>
>>>Thanks
>>>
>
>>
>>This should be of some help.
>>MINIMUM SKILL CHART
>>
>>Item Name--Skill Required--Sheets: Needed:
>>Metal bits--(10)
>>Files--(10)
>>Steel Boning-- (40)
>>Studs--(40)
>>Gorgets--(50)--(1 sheet)
>>Bracers--(55)--(1 sheet)
>>Boots--(55)--(1 sheet)
>>Mask--(60)--(2 sheets)
>>Sleeves--(60)--(2 sheets)
>>Helm--(60)--(2 sheets)
>>Mantle--(80)--(2 sheets)
>>Belt--(85)--(2 sheets)
>>Leggings--(100)--(3 sheets)
>>Tunics--(100)--( 3 sheets)
>>Cloaks--(145+)--( 3 sheets)
>>
>>These shall provide about a 20-30 % chance to make but it should be enough
>>to make a profit for continued learning.
>>
>>LeifLuss
>>
>>
>>
>
